_sText:
THIS IS MY LAST SUBMISSION
==================

This download contains a prefab for the dmg system
A testmap
Textures for hitboxes
And a tutorial how to use the dmg system and how to make basic attacks.
From now on i stop mapping until i see a bossfight map from an other mappers.
Those 3 screenshots are from my 3 bossfight maps i made
They show how a boss can be made. But for a bossfight server you need many many many maps and I dont have the time to make 20 bossfights so i hope that someone will try it.So this tutorial may open doors for other mapper to the world of counter strike monster hunter. 
(Yeah justin bieber is a monster thumbs up if you agree)

Community I know you can do it!!!!!!!!!!!!

THIS ARE THE LAST SUBMISSION FROM RAGNARA:

MAY UNDERWORLD RISE
------------------
